user_query: I'm writing a novel set in the Victorian era and I need to translate some modern English phrases to Shakespearean English. Translate the sentences 'I miss you', 'What's your name?', and 'Where can I find a horse carriage?' to Shakespearean English. Also, provide me with the translation of the number 2718281828.

TaskList.description: Translate the phrase 'I miss you' to Shakespearean English.
Translate the phrase 'What's your name?' to Shakespearean English.
Translate the phrase 'Where can I find a horse carriage?' to Shakespearean English.
Convert the number 2718281828 into Shakespearean English.
